thread.title: Video emerges of aftermath of Darrelle Revis altercation
thread.title_full: Video emerges of aftermath of Darrelle Revis altercation

author: DANIEL POPPER
title: Video emerges of aftermath of Darrelle Revis altercation
text:
Video emerges of aftermath of Darrelle Revis altercation Video emerges of aftermath of Darrelle Revis altercation Darrelle Revis faces several different charges after an alleged altercation in Pittsburgh. (Bill Kostroun/AP) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  36 PM 
In an alleged video of the moments after Darrelle Revis' altercation in Pittsburgh last Sunday, a man can be heard admitting to punching two individuals as part of an expletive-filled tirade. 
The 11-second video, obtained by TMZ , shows two men lying on the sidewalk. They appear unconscious. The gossip website says a Pittsburgh Police Dept. representative confirmed the video was from the Revis incident. 
"I knocked both of these motherf---ers out," the man in the video screams. "Both of them. They both sleeping. Shut up before I knock your a-- out next. Both of y'all, shut up." 
The words match up closely with what Revis was allegedly yelling after the Feb. 12 skirmish. "Do you want to be next?" Revis asked witness Nathan Watt, according to a police criminal complaint. 
Jets doing their homework on how to recoup $6M if they cut Revis 
The victims, Dallas Cousins and Zacheriah Jarvis, were unsure if Revis was the individual who threw the punches. Police say a man came to the aid of Revis, so it's possible he's the one talking in the video. 
Revis surrendered to police in Pittsburgh on Friday night. He's been charged with two counts of felony aggravated assault, one count of felony robbery, one count of felony conspiracy to commit aggravated assault, and one count of misdemeanor making terroristic threats. His next court date is Thursday. 
Revis' attorneys have painted the Jets star as a victim in the ordeal. They've also asked authorities to release the video footage referenced in last week's initial police statement. It's unclear if this TMZ clip is a part of that footage.
